participant_1.name: Max
participant_1.personality: Optimistic and friendly, always looking for new adventures.
participant_1.background: A blue whale once swam past my boat. I love romantic comedies, and they help me forget about my bad luck in relationships. I enjoy jazz music. I'm heading home after a long run to see my girlfriend and eat some tacos. I love the feeling of the ocean water on my skin when I'm snorkeling.

participant_2.name: Lily
participant_2.personality: Adventurous and ambitious, with a passion for fitness and music.
participant_2.background: I hike up volcanoes to stay fit and challenge myself. I work in retail. I listen to all kinds of music. I aspire to be a millionaire. I'm a vegetarian but I eat fish, especially sushi.

content.text: Just started my day, doing some chores and getting ready for work.
Oh, that's cool. I just got home from a long run, I'm headed to see my girlfriend and eat some tacos.
Tacos sound good, I'm a vegetarian but I love sushi.
Sushi is my favorite! I went snorkeling yesterday and it was so much fun, the ocean water felt amazing on my skin.
That sounds awesome, I love the beach and being outdoors. I hike up volcanoes to stay fit and challenge myself.
That sounds so cool! I would love to hike a volcano, but I'm not sure I'm in good enough shape yet.
You could always start with a smaller volcano, I'm sure you'd be able to do it.
I'll keep that in mind, thanks! What do you like to do for fun?
I listen to all kinds of music, I love jazz and I also love to go to concerts.
I love going to concerts too, I saw a great show last week. I'm actually an aspiring musician, I play the guitar.
That's awesome, I love playing the guitar too! I'm not very good, but it's a lot of fun.
It's a great instrument, and it's so much fun to play. I'm glad to meet another musician!
